Switchboard Delivery ITP013

Coordinate time of delivery - take photo of delivery docket

RCD

Installation of lighting cabling and fit off
Rough In
Confirm that the cable support system has been completed as per documentation
Electrical cables have been appropriately sized & selected to ensure that they will support currently installed & future equipment
Mechanical protection has been provided to minimise the likelihood of physical damage to cabling
Cabling has been concealed where possible in ceiling spaces, wall cavities or risers
All lights have been wired as per drawings
All lights & switches have been marked on the site as built drawings
Height & location have been confirmed for each switch
Lighting control system has been confirmed (DALI /2 40v)
Fit Off & Commission
Equipment/materials have been selected and installed as per drawings/specifications
Ceiling supports have been installed where required (ceiling fans / pendants
Terminations have been checked & all terminations are correct & secure in all outlets
Switches have all been secured in place & levelled
All lights are sitting flush & / or been levelled
All cablings has been tested for insulations resistance & continuity
Each circuit is terminated at the DB & protected by the correct protection device
Each switch has been labelled
Functional test carried out on each switch & light
Each circuit has been marked on the site as build's
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
